ingredients.ingredient: 1 (27 ounce) can whole green chiles - seeded, drained well, and patted dry
1 pound Monterey Jack cheese, cut into 3x1/2-inch thick strips

cookingTips: Pat green chiles very dry to prevent oil splatter and soggy egg rolls
Fill egg rolls firmly but don't overstuff or they'll burst during frying
Fry at 350Â°F until golden brown, about 2-3 minutes per side
